And there’s restaurant merch you need to have. For me, everything at Philadelphia’s premier sandwich shop Middle Child falls in the latter category, starting with this rad T-shirt. Chef and co-owner Matt Cahn tapped local artist Eric Kenney, who goes by the name Heavy Slime, for the illustration and Press & Release Printing to make it.The shirt ($30) is sold only at the shop, and it’s as essential as a sandwich order. (We also like their tote!) That’s because wearing it is a declaration that you’re in on the fact that such a place exists, where the sandwiches are always of the highest quality (short rib corned beef Reuben!) and lunches are never depressing. Plus, there’s a cute, recognizable little smiley face, both on the front and the back, which will elicit a Go Birds! from any in-the-know Philly native.
